revised_title: Spectroscopic Investigations of Hydrogen Bonding Interactions in Gas Phase: Identification of Hydrogen-Bonded Heterodimer and Determination of Its Geometry
tldr: The article investigates the hydrogen bonding interactions in the gas phase, specifically identifying the hydrogen-bonded heterodimer (CH3)3CCN-HF and determining its geometry using microwave and infrared spectroscopy. The study provides insights into the effects of hydrogen bonding on molecular properties and the strength of the interaction between molecules.
